The image is funny and satirical because it juxtaposes a calm and mundane scene with an absurdly dramatic one. On the left, a person is simply enjoying a cup of coffee while looking at a laptop screen displaying a coffee cup. On the right, another person is sipping coffee while casually observing a massive explosion (a mushroom cloud) outside the window. 

The humor comes from the contrast between the ordinary act of drinking coffee and the extraordinary, catastrophic event happening outside. It satirizes how people can sometimes be indifferent or oblivious to critical events happening around them, emphasizing a sense of calm detachment even in the face of chaos.
